fixed_skill.desc: Remove Fire resistance from 1 target for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Fire Break

innate_skill.desc: Decrease SP cost of skills by 2.4%.
innate_skill.name: Spell Master I

innate_skill.desc: Increase 1 ally's ailment accuracy and ailment resistance by 9.3%/9.8%/10.2%, and Speed by 5. For every 25% of the user's ailment accuracy, increase the target's ailment accuracy by 1.6%/1.7%/1.8% more, up to 6.4%/6.7%/7.0%. Lasts for 3 turns.
innate_skill.name: Sukukaja

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 7%. After using a skill on a foe, increase Fire damage taken by 7.1% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Fanatical Prophet

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 7%. After using a skill on a foe, increase Fire damage taken by 8.2% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Fanatical Prophet I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
